Major_Arcs.title: Early Page Adventures
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc introduces the comic with short, episodic adventures focusing on Alley Oop and King Guz.

sub_scenes.title: The Clam Debt Rescue
sub_scenes.description: Alley rescues King Guz and immediately demands repayment of an old debt, showcasing his opportunistic and somewhat humorous nature.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinosaur Troubles and Transition
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around Alley Oop's old dinosaur, its clumsiness, and the decision to consider a new dinosaur, culminating in a farewell to the old companion.

sub_scenes.title: Bronto's Clumsiness
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop's dinosaur's clumsiness is highlighted as it bumps into trees, leading to frustration and an explanation for its behavior.

sub_scenes.title: Considering a Replacement
sub_scenes.description: Cavemen discuss trading in their dinosaur and visit a dealership to explore new models, initiating the quest for a replacement.

sub_scenes.title: Test Driving the Zip-Pippy
sub_scenes.description: The test drive of a new dinosaur model leads to excitement and an unexpected biting incident, yet the purchase proceeds.

narrative_arcs.title: The Zip-Pippy Test Drive and Unexpected Bite

sub_scenes.title: Farewell to the Old Dinosaur
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop bids a sad farewell to his old dinosaur, acknowledging its service and promising to visit, marking the end of an era.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's Trade-in and Dealership Scenes
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc transitions from Alley Oop's dinosaur farewell to scenes at the dinosaur dealership, focusing on trading in Dinny and observing sales interactions.

sub_scenes.title: Journey to Honest Zog's Dealership with Dinny
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop journeys to Honest Zog's to trade in Dinny, contemplating Dinny's retirement and arriving at the dealership.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey to Honest Zog's Dealership with Dinny

sub_scenes.title: Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Price Haggling
sub_scenes.description: A sales interaction at Honest Zog's dealership where a salesman tries to sell a dinosaur, leading to price haggling and buyer skepticism.

narrative_arcs.title: Dinosaur Sales Pitch and Price Haggling

sub_scenes.title: The 'Fine Animal' Demonstration Mishap
sub_scenes.description: A dinosaur demonstration at the dealership goes wrong when the dinosaur bumps into a tree, highlighting the unpredictable nature of the animals.

sub_scenes.title: Angry Outburst and Dinny's Voice
sub_scenes.description: The aftermath of the dinosaur mishap leads to an angry outburst, which is interrupted by a surprising recognition of 'Dinny's voice', creating a cliffhanger.

Major_Arcs.title: Dinny's New Owner and Misunderstanding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on Dinny in the hands of a new owner, leading to a misunderstanding and perceived mistreatment, resolved by Dinny's large dinosaur companion.

sub_scenes.title: Dinny's Perceived Mistreatment and Defense
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is accused and attacked for mistreating a dinosaur, leading to his self-defense and highlighting a misunderstanding of the situation.

sub_scenes.title: Comfort and Reassurance from the Large Dinosaur
sub_scenes.description: Dinny is comforted by a large dinosaur, receiving reassurance and affection, offering a moment of emotional solace after the aggression.

narrative_arcs.title: Comfort and Reassurance from the Large Dinosaur

sub_scenes.title: The Impending Charge and Boomer Kid Preparation
sub_scenes.description: Dinny, riding the large dinosaur, charges forward, causing alarm and prompting other cavemen to prepare for a confrontation, ending on a cliffhanger.

narrative_arcs.title: The Impending Charge and Boomer Kid Preparation

Major_Arcs.title: Fishing and Romantic Troubles
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores romantic rejections and humorous disputes over fishing etiquette, contrasting romantic pursuits with mundane activities.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Invitation and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: A fishing plan is initiated, followed by Alley Oop's invitation to Ooola, which is met with a firm rejection, highlighting romantic discord.

sub_scenes.title: Fishing Etiquette Dispute
sub_scenes.description: Fishing activities lead to humorous disputes about noise levels and etiquette, culminating in an insult and an apology among cavemen.

narrative_arcs.title: Accusation of Noise and Womanly Insult

Major_Arcs.title: Oola's Romantic Competition and Jealousy
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc revolves around romantic jealousy and competition for Oola's affection, leading to confrontations and bitter realizations.

sub_scenes.title: News of Rival and Investigation
sub_scenes.description: News of a romantic rival for Oola reaches Pal Caveman, who initially disbelieves it but is urged to investigate.

narrative_arcs.title: Confronting the Truth of Oola's Infidelity

sub_scenes.title: Jealous Confrontation and Aftermath
sub_scenes.description: Jealousy erupts into violence as a muscular caveman attacks a smaller rival, followed by rejection and a bitter realization about romance.

Major_Arcs.title: Romance Advice and French Technique
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously explores different approaches to romance, contrasting violence with 'French' romantic techniques, and culminating in misguided romantic gestures.

sub_scenes.title: Contrasting Romance Advice
sub_scenes.description: Conflicting advice on romance is presented, contrasting violent approaches with the gentler 'French' method, setting up a humorous comparison.

sub_scenes.title: Flower and Branch Mishaps
sub_scenes.description: Humorous attempts at romantic gestures, involving flowers and a branch, lead to jealousy, comical failure, and public embarrassment.

narrative_arcs.title: The Branch Offering and the Crocodile

Major_Arcs.title: Jealousy and Finger-Eating Misunderstanding
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features escalating jealousy and a bizarre misunderstanding involving finger-eating accusations, culminating in a humorous twist.

sub_scenes.title: Angry Jealousy and Gossip
sub_scenes.description: Jealousy and anger are displayed by a muscular caveman, followed by gossip and social commentary on his behavior.

sub_scenes.title: Cannibal Accusation and Twist
sub_scenes.description: A violent confrontation leads to a cannibalism accusation, which is humorously twisted into a hand-kissing misunderstanding, creating a comedic resolution.

Major_Arcs.title: Infidelity Accusation and Romantic Turn
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc depicts an infidelity accusation, public shaming, and a surprising romantic turn as the accused caveman attempts to win back his partner.

sub_scenes.title: Infidelity and Public Shaming
sub_scenes.description: Accusations of infidelity lead to physical violence and public shaming, as a cavewoman confronts and leads a procession against a caveman.

narrative_arcs.title: Plea for Forgiveness and Frenchman Insult

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Turn and Fishing Interlude
sub_scenes.description: A sudden romantic turn as the caveman attempts to become more romantic, contrasted with a separate fishing scene featuring philosophical cavemen.

Major_Arcs.title: Twist Dance Craze and Disaster
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously portrays the disastrous consequences of a dance craze, leading to injuries, failed dance lessons, and a chaotic hospital scene.

sub_scenes.title: Twist Dance Injuries and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: Injuries from the 'Twist' dance are introduced, followed by a dance lesson attempt and rejection, culminating in an ultimatum.

sub_scenes.title: Disastrous Dance Lesson
sub_scenes.description: A disastrous dance lesson ensues with clumsy attempts and humorous mishaps, leading to the lesson's abrupt end and confusion.

narrative_arcs.title: 决心学习舞蹈和有条件的教学
课程结束与弗洛格小姐

sub_scenes.title: Twitch Party and Hospital Outbreak
sub_scenes.description: The aftermath of the dance lesson leads to public mockery at a 'Twitch Party' and a sudden shift to a hospital overwhelmed by 'Twitch' related injuries, ending the story segment.

Major_Arcs.title: Time Travel for Historical Research
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc initiates a science fiction plotline where time travel is used for historical research, leading to Alley Oop's journey to ancient Spain.

sub_scenes.title: Historical Research Problem and Solution
sub_scenes.description: Historians discuss the lack of information about 16th-century Spain and propose using time travel to send Alley Oop to gather firsthand accounts.

narrative_arcs.title: 西班牙历史研究的难题
派遣艾 Alley Oop 获取真相

sub_scenes.title: Romantic Interruption and Time Travel
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop's romantic moment is interrupted as he is pulled into the 20th century and then sent back to ancient Spain for a historical mission.

Major_Arcs.title: Alley Oop in Spain and Serenade Mishap
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc details Alley Oop's arrival in ancient Spain and his chaotic intervention in a street serenade, leading to conflict with locals.

sub_scenes.title: Arrival in Spain and Initial Encounter
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop arrives in Spain and is immediately confronted by a local, setting the stage for cultural misunderstandings and conflict.

sub_scenes.title: Serenade and Rejection
sub_scenes.description: A street serenade is introduced, showing a musician being rejected by the woman he is serenading, setting up Alley Oop's intervention.

sub_scenes.title: Intervention and Matador Revelation
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop intervenes in the serenade, attacking the musician and leading to the revelation that he has assaulted a famous matador, escalating the conflict.

narrative_arcs.title: 女友的愤怒与身份揭露

Major_Arcs.title: Bullfight Chaos and Alley Oop's Stone Age Bullfighting
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc humorously depicts the chaos ensuing from Don Jose's injury and Alley Oop's unexpected bullfighting performance using stone-age methods.

sub_scenes.title: Bullfight Delay and Improvised Plan
sub_scenes.description: Don Jose's injury delays the bullfight, leading to an improvised plan to have inexperienced men and Alley Oop participate as a novelty.

narrative_arcs.title: 斗牛比赛延误与替补方案

sub_scenes.title: Alley Oop's Bullfight and Return
sub_scenes.description: Alley Oop performs a stone-age bullfight, to the amusement of the audience, and returns to the 20th century, facing suspicion from Ooola.

narrative_arcs.title: 竞技场观众与经理的初步反应
竞技场上的赞扬与讽刺

Major_Arcs.title: King for a Day and Power Struggle
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc explores the humorous concept of 'King for a Day', showcasing a power struggle, public rejection of authority, and a king's ironic acceptance of chaos.

sub_scenes.title: King for a Day Introduction and Challenge
sub_scenes.description: The 'King for a Day' concept is introduced, followed by a challenge to the king's perceived easy role, leading to a power takeover.

sub_scenes.title: Proclamation, Rejection and Twisted Enjoyment
sub_scenes.description: A royal proclamation is met with public rejection and violence, which the new 'king' ironically rationalizes and even enjoys, highlighting a dark humor.

Major_Arcs.title: Guz's Ulcer and Ooma's Discipline
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc focuses on the domestic life of Guz and Ooma, highlighting Ooma's strict discipline and Guz's humorous attempts to navigate his health issues and her rules.

sub_scenes.title: Ulcer Pills and Dirty Feet
sub_scenes.description: Guz's attempt at leisure is disrupted by Ooma, who scolds him for eating ulcer pills like bon-bons and for his dirty feet, leading to a humorous domestic conflict.

Major_Arcs.title: Clam Dispute and Wise Man's Wisdom
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a humorous dispute over clams and a 'wise' man's unexpectedly self-serving solution, showcasing ironic wisdom.

sub_scenes.title: Clam Dispute and King's Intervention
sub_scenes.description: A dispute over found clams escalates, leading to the King's intervention and the introduction of the 'wise' man for resolution.

Major_Arcs.title: Moonina Palace Racket and Wise Man's Advice
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features a noisy fight at 'Moonina Palace', juxtaposed with the wise man's self-serving financial advice and the King's dinner interrupted by a violent servant.

sub_scenes.title: Palace Fight and Financial Advice
sub_scenes.description: A fight at 'Moonina Palace' prompts the King's investigation, followed by the wise man giving self-serving financial advice, and the King's dinner being disrupted.

narrative_arcs.title: Investigating the Racket and Palace Fight
The King's Dinner and Ulcer Concern

Major_Arcs.title: King's Dinner and Servant's Assault
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc continues the King's dinner scene, escalating from ulcer concerns to a sudden and violent assault by the servant, juxtaposing domesticity with absurdity.

sub_scenes.title: Dinner and Playful Assault
sub_scenes.description: The King's dinner conversation about ulcers takes a violent turn as the servant playfully approaches and then suddenly punches the King, creating a shocking and humorous contrast.

Major_Arcs.title: Apologies, Job Refusal and Ruler Proposal
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc features a series of short scenes revolving around apologies, job refusals, a desire for ordinary life, and a sudden proposal to become a ruler, ending with a bizarre duck measurement.

sub_scenes.title: Apology and Job Rejection
sub_scenes.description: An apology for a past action is given, followed by a strong job refusal and a subsequent expression of joy at returning to ordinary life.

narrative_arcs.title: Apology and Explanation After an Incident
Joy of Returning to Ordinary Life

sub_scenes.title: Ruler Proposal and Strange Duck
sub_scenes.description: A sudden proposal to become a ruler is presented, contrasted with a bizarre scene of cavemen measuring a 'strange duck,' creating a humorous juxtaposition of the mundane and the extraordinary.

narrative_arcs.title: Measuring and Speculation About a Strange Duck

Major_Arcs.title: Fortune Teller, Shaving and Time Machine Setup
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc presents a diverse set of scenes including a fortune teller's romantic prophecy, a shaving demonstration, barbershop satisfaction, and the setup for a malfunctioning time machine.

sub_scenes.title: Fortune and Shaving Scenes
sub_scenes.description: Scenes include a fortune teller predicting romance, a caveman's sudden departure, a shaving demonstration, and barbershop satisfaction, showcasing varied short narratives.

sub_scenes.title: Time Machine Malfunction
sub_scenes.description: The time machine plotline returns as a scientist sets up time travel, but it malfunctions, bringing a Roman soldier instead of the expected visitor, and the scientist resolves to fix it.
